description: The main script provides a relatively painless way to convert a     single directory of python packages into an easy_install compatible package    archive.  A typical use would be to expose the contents of your    PYTHON_EGG_CACHE directory, or your c.buildout download_cache, to other    people or computers on your local area network.
longdescription: The main script provides a relatively painless way to convert a     single directory of python packages into an easy_install compatible package    archive.  A typical use would be to expose the contents of your    PYTHON_EGG_CACHE directory, or your c.buildout download_cache, to other    people or computers on your local area network.
